meanings.definition: The strength of an electric current measured in amperes.
meanings.sent1: The amperages in the wires were too high for the small device.
meanings.sent2: He checked the amperages to ensure the circuit was functioning properly.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to increase the amperages in the power lines for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like high amperages, unstoppable and powerful.
meanings.sent5: The bright sparks danced along the high amperages, lighting up the room.

meanings.definition: The amount of electric current flowing through a circuit.
meanings.sent1: The amperages in the battery were too low to power the device.
meanings.sent2: The technician measured the amperages to troubleshoot the electrical issue.
meanings.sent3: The amperages in the wires decided to have a race to see who could flow faster.
meanings.sent4: His energy was like strong amperages, always moving forward.
meanings.sent5: The sudden surge in amperages caused the lights to flicker in the building.
